comment:
Variables:
- \( x_1 \): number of commercials to run on Pi TV
- \( x_2 \): number of commercials to run on Beta Video
- \( x_3 \): number of commercials to run on Gamma Live

Parameters:
- \( C_1 = 1200 \): cost of a commercial on Pi TV
- \( C_2 = 2000 \): cost of a commercial on Beta Video
- \( C_3 = 4000 \): cost of a commercial on Gamma Live
- \( V_1 = 2000 \): number of viewers attracted by a commercial on Pi TV
- \( V_2 = 5000 \): number of viewers attracted by a commercial on Beta Video
- \( V_3 = 9000 \): number of viewers attracted by a commercial on Gamma Live
- \( B = 20000 \): weekly budget

Constraints:
1. \( x_1 \geq 0 \): number of commercials on Pi TV cannot be negative
2. \( x_2 \geq 0 \): number of commercials on Beta Video cannot be negative
3. \( x_3 \geq 0 \): number of commercials on Gamma Live cannot be negative
4. \( x_2 \leq 8 \): limit on the number of commercials on Beta Video
5. \( x_3 \leq \frac{1}{3}(x_1 + x_2 + x_3) \): at most a third of all commercials should occur on Gamma Live
6. \( x_1 \geq 0.2(x_1 + x_2 + x_3) \): minimum of 20% of commercials should occur on Pi TV

Objective:
Maximize the total audience reach:
\[ \text{Maximize } 2000x_1 + 5000x_2 + 9000x_3 \]
